questions.stem: A friend sends you a cracked video editor that works only if you disable your antivirus first. In 1–3 sentences, explain why this is risky and what safer choice you would make instead.

rubric.point: Disabling protection invites hidden malware/credential-stealers bundled with cracks
Refuse the cracked copy and look for a legal free/trial or open-source alternative
Warn the friend or report the source to prevent further spread

questions.stem: After installing a pirated game, your laptop fans roar and the CPU stays at 90 %. Describe, in a few sentences, what may be happening and the immediate steps you would take.

rubric.point: Recognise possible cryptojacking/mining software hidden in the crack
Uninstall the cracked program and run a full malware scan or clean restore
Monitor system performance and avoid future untrusted downloads

questions.stem: You open your design files and see a note: “Files encrypted—pay within 48 h.” You remember installing a cracked plug-in last night. Briefly outline your response plan.

rubric.point: Disconnect the device from networks to stop spread of ransomware
Restore data from clean backups instead of paying the ransom
Learn to avoid cracked software that can carry ransomware in future

questions.stem: A coworker suggests saving licence fees by using a cracked accounting tool for client data. In 1–3 sentences, state the main dangers and a safer alternative.

rubric.point: Highlights risk of data breach or malware stealing sensitive client records
Mentions legal/licensing penalties for using pirated software
Proposes using genuine paid, free, or open-source software instead

questions.stem: You used cracked software last week. Today you must buy gifts online but worry a keylogger may be watching. Outline, in 2–3 sentences, the precautions you would take before entering card details.

rubric.point: Run a reputable malware scan or use a separate clean device
Use virtual/one-time payment methods or two-factor checkout to limit theft impact
Plan to uninstall the crack and reinstall the OS or restore from backup if infection found
